Patreon


-- CHANGE HISTORY --

If you spot there's something wrong or missing, or if you have a great suggestion, feel free to contact me!

All changes, most recent first

August 25, 2024
On the recipe page, the link back to the OMEO home page now includes the originating filled-in data, so you or someone you send the recipe page link to can continue exploring other options later.
August 24, 2024
Added icons next to the items.
August 24, 2024
Added the items Mace and Brush, and the enchantments Breach, Density and Wind Burst.
August 23, 2024
OMEO already threw a fresh unenchanted source item in the mix if it couldn't find source items of the correct type but without enchantments on them. OMEO now also does the same if it cannot find source items of the correct type but without a prior work penalty.
August 18, 2024
Initial beta release.
